languages.text: "Реставрация была статистически рассчитана на непостижимом для тебя уровне, мирян{mf|ин|ка}. Миллиарды переменных были учтены, на основании неисчислимых прогнозов были выработаны оптимальные стратегии. Встреча двух единиц Амарната была неизбежна, идентичные идентификаторы были искрой, которая вызовет цепную реакцию — так и случилось".

"The Restoration was statistically calculated on a level beyond your comprehension, lay{mf||wo}man. Billions of variables were taken into account. Countless scenarios went into the development of optimal strategies. Two Amarnat units meeting each other was an inevitable certainty. The matching identifiers were to be a spark that would start a chain reaction. And that was precisely what happened."
languages.original_text: "Реставрация была статистически рассчитана на непостижимом для тебя уровне, мирян{mf|ин|ка}. Миллиарды переменных были учтены, на основании неисчислимых прогнозов были выработаны оптимальные стратегии. Встреча двух единиц Амарната была неизбежна, идентичные идентификаторы были искрой, которая вызовет цепную реакцию — так и случилось".

languages.text: 「復元はあなたの理解が及ばぬ水準で、統計的に計算されているのだ、俗人よ。考慮された変数は数十億にのぼる。無数のシナリオが最適な戦略のために開発されたのだ。ふたつのアマルナトユニットが出会うのは必然も必然。識別子の一致が連鎖反応開始の火花に設定されていた。そして正確に事は進んだ」
languages.original_text: "The Restoration was statistically calculated on a level beyond your comprehension, lay{mf||wo}man. Billions of variables were taken into account. Countless scenarios went into the development of optimal strategies. Two Amarnat units meeting each other was an inevitable certainty. The matching identifiers were to be a spark that would start a chain reaction. And that was precisely what happened."

traits.locale_text: 「復元はあなたの理解が及ばぬ水準で、統計的に計算されているのだ、俗人よ。考慮された変数は数十億にのぼる。無数のシナリオが最適な戦略のために開発されたのだ。ふたつのアマルナトユニットが出会うのは必然も必然。識別子の一致が連鎖反応開始の火花に設定されていた。そして正確に事は進んだ」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “复原过程所需的统计计算水平超出了你的理解，外行人。数以十亿计的变量被考虑在内，无数场景被提出，以制定最优策略。两个阿玛纳特单位的相遇是不可避免的必然之事，彼此匹配的标识符将成为引发连锁反应的火花。事情就是这样发生的。”
languages.original_text: "The Restoration was statistically calculated on a level beyond your comprehension, lay{mf||wo}man. Billions of variables were taken into account. Countless scenarios went into the development of optimal strategies. Two Amarnat units meeting each other was an inevitable certainty. The matching identifiers were to be a spark that would start a chain reaction. And that was precisely what happened."

traits.locale_text: “复原过程所需的统计计算水平超出了你的理解，外行人。数以十亿计的变量被考虑在内，无数场景被提出，以制定最优策略。两个阿玛纳特单位的相遇是不可避免的必然之事，彼此匹配的标识符将成为引发连锁反应的火花。事情就是这样发生的。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « La probabilité d'une Restauration a été statistiquement calculée à un niveau qui dépasse de loin votre compréhension, profane, en prenant en considération des milliards de variables. Des stratégies optimales ont été développées en tenant compte d'une quantité infinie de scénarios. Il était inévitable que deux unités d'Amarnat finissent par se rencontrer. La similarité des identifiants devait déclencher une réaction en chaîne, et c'est précisément ce qui est arrivé. »
languages.original_text: "The Restoration was statistically calculated on a level beyond your comprehension, lay{mf||wo}man. Billions of variables were taken into account. Countless scenarios went into the development of optimal strategies. Two Amarnat units meeting each other was an inevitable certainty. The matching identifiers were to be a spark that would start a chain reaction. And that was precisely what happened."

traits.locale_text: « La probabilité d'une Restauration a été statistiquement calculée à un niveau qui dépasse de loin votre compréhension, profane, en prenant en considération des milliards de variables. Des stratégies optimales ont été développées en tenant compte d'une quantité infinie de scénarios. Il était inévitable que deux unités d'Amarnat finissent par se rencontrer. La similarité des identifiants devait déclencher une réaction en chaîne, et c'est précisément ce qui est arrivé. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «La Restauración se calculó estadísticamente aplicando un método que está fuera de los límites de tu comprensión, profan{mf|o|a}. Se tomaron en cuenta billones de variables y esos innumerables escenarios contribuyeron al desarrollo de estrategias óptimas. El encuentro de dos unidades de Amarnat estaba asegurado. Los identificadores coincidentes debían ser la chispa que iniciara una reacción en cadena. Y eso fue justo lo que pasó».
languages.original_text: "The Restoration was statistically calculated on a level beyond your comprehension, lay{mf||wo}man. Billions of variables were taken into account. Countless scenarios went into the development of optimal strategies. Two Amarnat units meeting each other was an inevitable certainty. The matching identifiers were to be a spark that would start a chain reaction. And that was precisely what happened."

traits.locale_text: «La Restauración se calculó estadísticamente aplicando un método que está fuera de los límites de tu comprensión, profan{mf|o|a}. Se tomaron en cuenta billones de variables y esos innumerables escenarios contribuyeron al desarrollo de estrategias óptimas. El encuentro de dos unidades de Amarnat estaba asegurado. Los identificadores coincidentes debían ser la chispa que iniciara una reacción en cadena. Y eso fue justo lo que pasó».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Die Restoration wurde auf einem Niveau jenseits Eures Verständnisses statistisch berechnet, {mf|Laie|Laiin}. Milliarden von Variablen wurden berücksichtigt. Unzählige Szenarien sind in die Entwicklung der optimalen Strategien eingeflossen. Es war eine unvermeidliche Gewissheit, dass sich zwei Amarnat-Einheiten begegnen würden. Die identischen IDs würden ein Funke sein, der eine Kettenreaktion auslöst. Und genau das ist geschehen."
languages.original_text: "The Restoration was statistically calculated on a level beyond your comprehension, lay{mf||wo}man. Billions of variables were taken into account. Countless scenarios went into the development of optimal strategies. Two Amarnat units meeting each other was an inevitable certainty. The matching identifiers were to be a spark that would start a chain reaction. And that was precisely what happened."

traits.locale_text: "Die Restoration wurde auf einem Niveau jenseits Eures Verständnisses statistisch berechnet, {mf|Laie|Laiin}. Milliarden von Variablen wurden berücksichtigt. Unzählige Szenarien sind in die Entwicklung der optimalen Strategien eingeflossen. Es war eine unvermeidliche Gewissheit, dass sich zwei Amarnat-Einheiten begegnen würden. Die identischen IDs würden ein Funke sein, der eine Kettenreaktion auslöst. Und genau das ist geschehen."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Yeniden Yapılanma, senin gibi sıradan birinin idrak edebileceğinden çok daha üst seviye istatistiksel hesaplamalarla ortaya kondu. Milyarlarca değişken hesaba katıldı. Optimal stratejilerin geliştirilmesi için sayısız senaryo denendi. İki Amarnat biriminin birbiriyle karşılaşması, kaçınılmaz bir kesinliğe sahipti. Eşleşen kimlikler, ilk kıvılcımı yakıp zincirleme bir reaksiyon başlatacaktı. Tam olarak da bunu yaptılar."
languages.original_text: "The Restoration was statistically calculated on a level beyond your comprehension, lay{mf||wo}man. Billions of variables were taken into account. Countless scenarios went into the development of optimal strategies. Two Amarnat units meeting each other was an inevitable certainty. The matching identifiers were to be a spark that would start a chain reaction. And that was precisely what happened."

traits.locale_text: "Yeniden Yapılanma, senin gibi sıradan birinin idrak edebileceğinden çok daha üst seviye istatistiksel hesaplamalarla ortaya kondu. Milyarlarca değişken hesaba katıldı. Optimal stratejilerin geliştirilmesi için sayısız senaryo denendi. İki Amarnat biriminin birbiriyle karşılaşması kaçınılmaz bir kesinliğe sahipti. Eşleşen kimlik saptayıcılar, zincirleme bir reaksiyon başlatacak kıvılcımlardı. Tam olarak da bunu yaptılar."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
